channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Tivoli Federated Identity Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Tivoli Federated Identity Manager

item.title: CVE-2017-1319|2024-08-05T13:32:28.417Z -- ibm -- tivoli%20federated%20identity%20manager
item.description: IBM Tivoli Federated Identity Manager 6.2 is affected by a vulnerability due to a missing secure attribute in encrypted session (SSL) cookie. IBM X-Force ID: 125731.
